name: Bitke (bitke)
description:
Join our Discord https://discord.gg/YHZsDSwsF2
Website: https://playbitke.com

BITKE will be a  FPS Paintball based shooter where you can play against friends and other members of the community. For now there is a 3rd person multiplayer test build. 

To play, you need to have access to a character. For now, characters are periodically released in new drops and introduced to our game. You will be able play in our alpha by participating in the early minting of our CNFTs.
